name: Justin Time Game Pack
description:
Join Justin, Olive, and Squidgy through three fun and exciting games inspired by their adventures. Intuitive controls and addictive gameplay will provide hours of entertainment to your child.

Meatball Mayhem - Help Justin catch the falling meatballs, as fast as you can!

Bubble Blitz - Blow bubbles to catch all of the butterflies. Be careful of all those pesky bees though!

Tumble & Tilt - Drop Squidgy into the coloured boxes and collect as much treasure as you can.

Take the Justin Time adventures with you, compete against friends and family and see who can get the highest scores.

Features:
- 3 unique games, catered to the pre-school audience
- Local high score for each of the different games
